channel.title: Hugo on Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Journal

item.title: Begin at the Beginning
item.description: On New Year’s Eve of 2018, I decided to use Git to handle all my (non-private) note-keeping. My GitHub space was looking neglected (mainly because I rarely make my projects public) so I decided to freshen it up by using it to keep track of all my notes. There was another reason… I’ve been hankering to try Hugo out. I don’t remember where I read about Hugo but it was around the same time I found out about Jekyll.
